title: Emails
alt: Hey Rob, sorry it took me a while to get back to you! Sure, I'd love to see WALL-E opening weekend! Are you still doing that, or...?
transcript:
[Megan and Cueball are walking along.]
Megan: Did you have any New Year's Resolutions?
Cueball: Gonna finally finish dealing with those emails from 2008.[Caption below the panel:] 
As my email backlog approaches 10 years, I'm starting to have doubts about my approach.
